scenes.action_text: THE COOLER Written by Frank Hannah & Wayne Kramer EXT. STYGIAN DARKNESS - NIGHT STYGIAN DARKNESS The suggestion of traveling through space. Suddenly a star sparkles to life in the distance. Gives rise to another... and another... until we're looking at a whole galaxy of stars. No, not stars. LIGHTS. NEON LIGHTS. A throbbing skyline of neon. LAS VEGAS, NEVADA. As seen from a descending aerial sh
